definition: A sudden and unexpected event or occurrence that disrupts the normal course of events, often causing inconvenience, disturbance, or conflict. It is commonly used to describe an incident or an unexpected happening that interrupts or alters the planned or expected course of action.

examples.german: Es gab einen Zwischenfall auf der Autobahn.
examples.english: There was an incident on the highway.

examples.german: Der Zwischenfall führte zu einer Verzögerung.
Ein Zwischenfall ereignete sich während der Veranstaltung.
examples.english: An incident occurred during the event.
The police are investigating the incident.
